item.trans: adj. 生锈的，腐蚀的；铁锈色的，锈色的；迟钝的 同义词:slow, dull The wiring in your phone may have gotten rusty .说不定电话机里面的配线生锈了。
n. 多样；种类；杂耍 同义词:category, manner, nature, kind, sort Readers should benefit from the greater variety .读者应该受益于更大的多样性。
adj. 明智的；明显的；意识到的；通晓事理的 n. 可感觉到的东西；敏感的人 同义词:obvious, aware, distinct, wise, visible This is a sensible agenda .这是一项明智的议程。

adj. 直的；连续的；笔直的；正直的；整齐的 adv. 直接地；不断地；立即；坦率地 n. 直；直线 同义词:continuing, endless, ordered, regular, running, constantly, directly, forever, rapidly, continually, beeline, gerade Tell us the straight of it .告诉我们事情的真相吧。
adj. 实际的；实用性的 同义词:actual, effective, real, pragmatic, positive Planning for the period while advanced AGI emerges is more practical .更切实际的是去计划好”高等“AGI出现后的时期。
n. 热情；热心；热诚 同义词:passion, flame, fire, warmth, fervor But in their zeal to act , politicians and regulators are looking through the wrong end of the telescope .但行动热情高涨的政治家和监管者正从望远镜的错误一端看问题。
n. 财富；命运；运气 vt. 给予财富 vi. 偶然发生 同义词:wealth, treasure, money, fate, luck, chance to, happen to THE wheel of fortune turns swiftly in politics .抓阄转轮在政治中很快地被启用。
n. 发电机；发生器；生产者 同义词:producer, electrical machine The generator has a sidekick : a water - purification machine , called Slingshot .该发电机具有助手：一种水净化机，被叫做弹弓。
n. 老兵；老手；富有经验的人；老运动员 adj. 经验丰富的；老兵的 同义词:old moustache, warhorse, seasoned I have a son who is a veteran - he just came back from Iraq .我的一个儿子是退伍军人，他刚刚从伊拉克回来。
n. 算术，算法 同义词:algorithm, number At each step , some arithmetic or logical operation is performed on some data .每个步骤中，一些算术和逻辑操作作用在一些数据中。
adv. 非常，极其；极端地 同义词:badly, highly, greatly, too, rare Eisenhower was a hero of the war and was an extremely popular man .艾森豪威尔是战争英雄，也是一个非常受欢迎的人。
vt. 寻求；寻找；探索；搜索 vi. 寻找；探索；搜索 同义词:explore, try to find, explore, cast about for to seek a quarrel with somebody向…寻衅
n. 电影；薄膜；胶卷；轻烟 vt. 在…上覆以薄膜；把…拍成电影 vi. 摄制电影；生薄膜；变得朦胧 同义词:movie, membrane, cinema, cinematograph Tears films her eyes.眼泪布满了她的双眼。
adj. 适当的 vt. 占用；拨出 同义词:suitable, proper, adequate, becoming, engage, take up to That selfish student always appropriates the biggest bookcase and desk.那个自私的学生总是占用最大的书橱和书桌。
n. 告别，辞别；再见；再会 int. 别了！（常含有永别或不容易再见面的意思）；再会！ adj. 告别的 同义词:adieux, leave-taking, tara, valedictory to farewell the friends向朋友告别
n. 射线；光线 vt. 放射；显出 vi. 放射光线；浮现 同义词:stream, radial, emit, bore out, to emerge The moon is raying across the bay.月光照射着整个海湾。
n. 袭击；突袭；搜捕；抢劫 vi. 对…进行突然袭击 vt. 袭击，突袭 同义词:robbery, assault, hit, descend on They were going to raid Warsaw the next day.他们将于次日袭击华沙。
vt. 实施，执行；强迫，强制 同义词:perform, actualize to enforce laws strictly严格执行法律
vt. 强迫，迫使；强使发生 同义词:pressure, force, enforce They were often compelled to work eleven or twelve hours a day.他们常常被迫每天工作十一二个小时。
num. 四；四个 adj. 四的；四个的 同义词:tetradic You will hear four people asking the way to four different places on the map .你将听到四个人在问路，他们要到地图上四个不同的地方去。
n. 测量；措施；程度；尺寸 vt. 测量；估量；权衡 vi. 测量；估量 同义词:extent, degree, survey, dimension, size, sound, scale, estimate, take stock of, weigh up to measure the cliff测量悬崖的高度
adj. 主要的；重要的；主修的；较多的 n. [人类] 成年人；主修科目；陆军少校 vi. 主修 同义词:crucial, important, primary, considerable, central, adult My major was Economics and Trade .我主修的是经济与贸易。
vt. 漏掉；错过；想念 同义词:lose, let slip The batter missed the ball.击球员未击中球。
vt. 用树篱笆围住；避免作正面答复 vi. 用树篱围住；避免作正面答复 n. 树篱；障碍 同义词:bar, obstacle, dam, let, stop My house has been hedged off.我的住家已用树篱围了起来。
n. 轻视，蔑视；耻辱 同义词:despite, defiance He interpreted . the silence as contempt .他把这沉默视为轻蔑。
vt. 包含；由…组成 同义词:involve, contain The committee comprises men of widely different views.该委员会包括了具有各种不同意见的人。
adj. 行政的；经营的；执行的，经营管理的 n. 经理；执行委员会；执行者；经理主管人员 同义词:administrative, front-office, manager, gerente Students with poor executive function need help to organize research .执行功能不好的学生需要帮助来组织研究。
vt. 申请；涂，敷；应用 vi. 申请；涂，敷；适用；请求 同义词:put in for, enter one's name for, demand, put in for to apply one's knowledge to a problem把知识应用于解决问题
n. 英雄；男主角，男主人公 同义词:chief actor, starring actor You chose a very good hero .你选了一个很好的英雄。
vt. 释放；发射；让与；允许发表 n. 释放；发布；让与 同义词:deliver, send, free, project, convey, liberation, issuance He was released from prison after serving a sentence of five years.他在服刑五年后从狱中释放出来。
adv. 也就是 abbr. （拉丁）即（id est） Those figures fully manifest the most marked characteristic of deformation art i. e . their weirdness and oddness .这些形象充分显示了变形艺术的最突出的特征，即形象的怪诞、离奇。
n. 蒸气（等于vapor）；水蒸气 Help ! I 'm turning into vapour .救命！我快要变成水蒸气了。

adj. 电的；电动的；发电的；导电的；令人震惊的 n. 电；电气车辆；带电体 同义词:dynamoelectric, motor-driven, electrified body And though he is not the most electric of speakers , crowds listen to him because of who he is.尽管他不是演讲者中最令人兴奋的，人们听他说话是因为他的所作所为。

n. 群众,一伙;一堆,许多,大众 v. 拥挤,挤满,挤进 vt. 挤满,将...塞进;催促,催逼 vi. 挤,拥挤,聚集 同义词:burst at the seams, be packed with, lot, band, concentrate, pile, collect, mass, pack They crowded around the table to get their food.他们围着桌子领取食物。
conj. 假如；倘若 v. 提供；给予（provide的过去式） 同义词:if, supposing, gave, supplied Mother provided a good dinner.妈妈准备了一顿美味的饭菜。
n. 报信者，送信者；先驱 同义词:precursor, forerunner And tell messenger that he or she must be explicit .另外还要告诉那位代言人，必须直截了当。
vt. 抢劫；使…丧失；非法剥夺 vi. 抢劫；掠夺 同义词:hijack, spoliate, prey upon, pillage They robbed the bank in broad daylight.他们在光天化日之下就抢劫银行。
n. 投票，选举；选票；得票数 vt. 提议，使投票；投票决定；公认 vi. 选举，投票 同义词:election, poll, make the offer, propone, poll I didn't vote in the last election.上次选举时我没投票。
adj. 道德的；精神上的；品性端正的 n. 道德；寓意 同义词:psychological, ethical, overtone A still larger question is over moral hazard .一个更大的问题在于道德风险。
n. 独立性，自立性；自主 同义词:freedom, juche How do you celebrate Independence Day ?你们怎么庆祝独立日呢?。
adj. 粗糙的；粗俗的；下等的 同义词:crude, rough, low, inferior, lower Nematode damage to the soybean roots is characterized by coarse roots .线虫破坏大豆根系的特征是：根系粗糙。

adj. 优先的；在先的，在前的 adv. 在前，居先 同义词:preferred, underlying, before, antecedently The downside to such a policy is that it reinforces the structure of the economy that prevailed prior to the recession .而这样的政策也有负面发展的可能性，那就是它进一步强化了经济衰退之前的经济结构。
vt. 提供；供应；装备 同义词:afford, prepare, serve, tender, lend to furnish information提供情报
adj. 沉闷的；冗长乏味的 同义词:dreary, dreich It would , however, be very tedious and difficult to write all information in binary code .把所有的信息都翻译成二进制码是十分枯燥和困难的。
n. 缺点；短处 同义词:defect, deficiency, disadvantage, vice, fault You should speak your mind about his shortcoming .你应该直言不讳地说出他的缺点。
n. 编者，编辑；社论撰写人；编辑装置 同义词:compilation, redaction to editor the educational books编辑教育图书
n. 面纱；面罩；遮蔽物；托词 vt. 遮蔽；掩饰；以面纱遮掩；用帷幕分隔 vi. 蒙上面纱；出现轻度灰雾 同义词:yashmak, facemask, shadow, shield, curtain She veiled her face when she went out into the street.她上街时用面纱蒙着脸。
vi. 不同意；不一致；争执；不适宜 同义词:conflict, to disapprove of The conclusions disagree with the facts.这些结论与事实不符。

n. 接收器；接受者；收信机；收款员，接待者 同义词:taker, acceptor The challenge modern cryptographers face is for sender and receiver to share a key while ensuring that no one has filched a copy.现代的密码专家所遇到的挑战是，如何让发送者与接收者共同拥有一把钥匙，并保证不会外流。
n. [计] 主机；主人；主持人；许多 vt. 主持；当主人招待 vi. 群集；做主人 同义词:lots of, sea, hundred, master, thousands of, to chair, preside over, pack, troop Mr. Marce will host a reception tonight.马斯先生将主持今晚的招待会。
vt. 减少；使变弱；使变淡 vi. 变弱；畏缩；变软弱 同义词:shorten, to cut down, moderate, recoil from The flood weakened the dam.洪水损坏了大坝。
vi. 喘气；喘息；渴望 vt. 气喘吁吁地说；喘着气说话 n. 喘气 同义词:blow, rare, puff out, broken wind, pursiness After running such a long way, the messenger was gasping for breath.传令兵在跑了这么长一段路后，直喘粗气。
vt. 恢复；弥补；重新获得 vi. 恢复；胜诉；重新得球 n. 还原至预备姿势 同义词:restore, repair, offset, resume, restore, unsave He lost his new bike,but he recovered it in the school.他丢了新自行车，但从学校又找到了。
n. 振动；犹豫；心灵感应 同义词:oscillation, hesitation This hardly ever happens out of the blue : there are usually warning signs such as noise , vibration or heat .机器是不可能突然故障的：通常机器在故障前会有告警信号，例如噪音、振动或发热。
n. 政策，方针；保险单 同义词:deal, programm The most common complaint centres on foreign policy .最常见的抱怨集中在外交政策上。
n. 牛；牲畜（骂人的话）；家畜；无价值的人 同义词:ox, moo-cow The cowboys herded the cattle and drove them to market .牧童将牛集在一起将它们赶到市场上去。
n. 导体；售票员；领导者；管理人 同义词:leader, Moses, supervisor, administrator Yang Lihua . He 's a famous conductor in China .杨利华。他是一位著名的中国指挥家。

adj. 很可能的；合适的；有希望的 adv. 很可能；或许 同义词:applicable, becoming, shaped, possible, promising, probably, belike Bolster core actions with those related to the future you deem most likely .以与你相信最为可能的未来相关的东西来支持核心行动。
vt. 挤；紧握；勒索 vi. 压榨 n. 压榨；紧握；拥挤；佣金 同义词:force one's way, thread one's way, compression, commission, purchase to squeeze oneself into the lift挤进电梯
adj. （男子）英俊的；可观的；大方的，慷慨的；健美而端庄的 同义词:generous, liberal Every girl on the campus has a crush on those handsome boys .校园内的每个女孩都有自己迷恋的潇洒的小伙子。
vt. 刺；刺伤；戳；刺穿；直入 vi. 刺；刺伤；戳；刺痛 n. 刺；戳；尝试；突发的一阵 同义词:stick, pink, smart, puncture wound, stroke, experiment, go, try, thorn He stabbed a piece of beef from the plate.他从盘子里叉起一块牛肉。
n. 报复；复仇 vt. 报复；替…报仇；洗雪 vi. 报仇；雪耻 同义词:vengeance, retaliation, revanche, get back on, get even with, right a wrong He revenged the murder of his father.他报了杀父之仇。
adj. 一般的，普通的；综合的；大体的 n. 一般；将军，上将；常规 同义词:ordinary, integrated, synthetic, comprehensive, average, strategos, aga Attorney General(美国的)司法部长；(英国)检察总长
n. 桃子；桃树；桃红色；受人喜欢的人（或物） adj. 桃色的；用桃子制成的 vi. 告密 vt. 告发 同义词:fushia, cherry red, inform, rat, tell on, blow the whistle Have you heard the news? Brown has peached against us.你可听到消息?布朗出卖了我们。

n. 激动，洋溢；面红；萌芽；旺盛；奔流 vt. 使齐平；发红，使发亮；用水冲洗；使激动 vi. 发红，脸红；奔涌；被冲洗 adj. 大量的；齐平的；丰足的，洋溢的；挥霍的 同义词:seed, warmth, excitation, agitation, heat, electrify, blush, massive, extensive, substantial, macro, much She began to flush with excitement.她由于激动脸开始发红。
n. 瓷器 adj. 瓷制的 同义词:porcelain ware, stoneware, porcelain China hit back over the weekend .中国上周末进行了反击。

adj. 强大的；强有力的 adv. 很；非常 同义词:formidable, cogent, greatly, quite, badly, extremely, too, highly, far Galileo used this powerful telescope to study the sky four days after a new moon .伽利略在新月出现四天以后用这种强大的望远镜观察天空。
n. 寒冷；寒意；寒心 adj. 寒冷的；冷漠的；扫兴的 vt. 冷冻，冷藏；使寒心；使感到冷 vi. 冷藏；变冷 同义词:cold, algor, cold, distant, refrigerate I want this beer to chill so I'll leave it in the fridge for an hour.我想要啤酒变凉，因此我把它放在冰箱里一小时。

adj. 比例的，成比例的；相称的，均衡的 n. [数] 比例项 同义词:relative, matching, uniform, worthy Labour offered to enact AV and conduct a referendum on a much more proportional system , the single transferable vote ( STV ).工党建议通过选择投票制，并实行一种更多比例制的公投制度——单一可转移票制（STV）。
n. 日志，日记；日记簿 同义词:journal, day book to diary the morning把当天上午发生的事记入办公日志
n. 铁轨；扶手；横杆；围栏 vi. 抱怨；责骂 vt. 铺铁轨；以横木围栏 同义词:pen, rider, rate, beef about The police railed the spot where the accident happened.警察将事故发生的地点用栏杆围起来。
vt. 承担，保证；从事；同意；试图 同义词:accept, pursue, address, try, offer We could undertake the work for the time being.我们可以暂时从事这项工作。
vt. 反射；重复 vi. 随声附和；发出回声 n. 回音；效仿 同义词:reflect, mirror, repeat, aftersound, bounceback The hall echoed with cheers.欢呼声响彻大厅。
adj. 值得做的，值得花时间的 It is also easier in a poorer country to find worthwhile infrastructure projects — from railways to power grids — to spend money on.对于最贫穷国家来说，也更容易找到有价值的基础建设项目---从铁路到电网---进行投资。
n. 条件；情况；环境；身份 vt. 决定；使适应；使健康；以…为条件 同义词:circumstance, situation, context, qualification, thing, adapt, suit, season, conclude She soon conditioned the children to the cold weather.她很快就使孩子们适应了寒冷的天气。
n. 怀疑；疑问；疑惑 v. 怀疑；不信；恐怕；拿不准 同义词:challenge, question, query, suspicion, suspect of, be suspicious of I never doubted you; I was sure you would bring me the money.我从不怀疑你的，我肯定你会给我带来这笔钱的。
n. 装置；策略；图案 同义词:apparatus, installation, strategy, unit, gear This is its first attempt to sell its own device .这是它第一次尝试销售自己的研发产品。
adj. 富饶的，肥沃的；能生育的 n. 肥沃，多产 同义词:rich, viable, pregnancy, enrichment Fertile lands in some states could be mistaken for lakes .有些州肥沃的土地可能会误变成湖泊。
n. 力量；力气；兵力；长处 同义词:force, might, excellence, muscle, power Sam is noted strength .萨姆是个著名的大力士。
n. 安慰；舒适；安慰者 vt. 安慰；使（痛苦等）缓和 同义词:relief, ease, consolation, quiet, soothe Her mother's word comforted the sobbing girl.她母亲的话使这个哭哭啼啼的女孩得到慰藉。
vt. 由铁道运输；铺设铁路；以捏造不实之罪使入狱 vi. 在铁路工作；乘火车旅行；筑铁路 n. 铁路；铁路公司 同义词:Eisenbahn They will railroad these goods to Shanghai.他们将由铁路把这些货物运往上海。

adj. 特殊的；独特的；奇怪的；罕见的 n. 特权；特有财产 同义词:specific, distinct, unique, strange, individual, franchise, special privilege The reason is the discovery , in 2004 , of some peculiar seashells of that age in Blombos, a seaside cave in South Africa .原因就是在2004年，在南非海边的一个洞穴，布隆伯斯洞中发现了一些罕见的海贝。
n. 纵队，列；专栏；圆柱，柱形物 同义词:pillar, tier This column leans towards the instrumental approach .本专栏倾向于工具主义方法。
vt. 逃避，避免；被忘掉 vi. 逃脱；避开；溜走 n. 逃跑；逃亡 同义词:get out of, shun, get away, keep clear of, hijra, desertion to escape from the burning house逃出失火的房子
n. 鼠；卑鄙小人，叛徒 vi. 捕鼠；背叛，告密 同义词:traitor, betrayer, mouse, inform Have you ever heard about dogs going ratting?你听说过狗拿耗子吗?
n. 军队；组；群；多数 vi. 群集；成群而行；结队 vt. 把（骑兵）编成骑兵连 同义词:army, majority, force, group, team, host, pack The spectators trooped out of the stadium.观众成群结队地走出体育场。
n. 展览，显示；展览会；展览品 同义词:expo, display, show, fair, manifestation The company showed the prototype of the new model at the exhibition .公司在展览会上展示了这种新模型的原型。
n. 薄片；部分；菜刀，火铲 vt. 切下；把…分成部分；将…切成薄片 vi. 切开；割破 同义词:proportion, part, portion, percent, integral, chip off, chip out, cut open, to cut to slice potatoes把土豆切成薄片
adv. 大约，近似地；近于 同义词:around, something That painting approximates reality.那幅画逼真。

adj. 被俘虏的；被迷住的 n. 俘虏；迷恋者 同义词:spellbound, prisoner Lebanon 's interior minister says 350 Lebanese soldiers and police officers are being captive .黎巴嫩内务部长称，已有350名黎巴嫩士兵和警察被囚禁。
n. 马厩；牛棚 adj. 稳定的；牢固的；坚定的 vi. 被关在马厩 vt. 赶入马房 同义词:mews, cowshed, steady, settled, committed, firm, strong He was stabled by the farmers.他被农夫们关进了马厩。
adj. 加强的；集中的；透彻的；加强语气的 n. 加强器 同义词:enhanced, reinforced, concentrated, searching, mass Pest control is one of the major areas of concern in intensive agriculture .病虫害防治是集约型农业所关心的主要方面之一。
n. 地点；位置；场所 vt. 设置；为…选址 同义词:location, spot, situation, where, lie, intercalate, instal to site a new building为新建楼房选址

n. 块，块状；肿块；瘤；很多；笨人 vt. 混在一起；使成块状；忍耐；笨重地移动 vi. 结块 adj. 成团的；总共的 adv. 很；非常 同义词:piece, block, tumor, mass, node, tough, resist, gross, volumed, greatly, quite, badly, extremely, too, highly, far to lump dough把生面做成块状
n. 百万；无数 adj. 百万的；无数的 num. 百万 同义词:mega, innumerability, thousand, countless, infinite Its permit allows it to take in million tonnes of waste a year .该垃圾场的营业许可证准许其一年的垃圾处理量为一百万公吨。
vi. 变化；变异；违反 vt. 改变；使多样化；变奏 同义词:pass, change from, influence, fashion, shift, innovate I can vary the speed at will.我可以随意改变速度。
adj. 文法的；符合语法规则的 同义词:well-formed In the meantime , consult dictionaries and memorize grammatical rules .同时还要查阅词典，记语法规则。
n. 自由；许可；冒失 同义词:freedom, permission, leave Do no through fear of poverty surrender liberty .不要因为畏惧贫穷而放弃自由。
vi. 尝试；进行实验 n. 实验，试验；尝试 同义词:have a try, try one's hand, stroke, proof, try, go to experiment with a new procedure试验新步骤

adj. 有义务的；受约束的；装有封面的 vt. 束缚；使跳跃 n. 范围；跳跃 vi. 限制；弹起 同义词:controlled, liable, chain, jump, dance, region, extent, scope, spectrum, territory, range, area, to limit, be confined to The colt bounded through the meadow.那匹马驹跳着跑过牧场。
adj. 令人愉快的，舒适的；讨人喜欢的，和蔼可亲的 同义词:lovely, favorable, comfortable, grateful, easy The climate in Australia is generally pleasant .一般来说，澳大利亚气候宜人。
n. 追赶，追求；职业，工作 同义词:profession, employment, career, calling, job The pursuit of maximum profit seems destined to prevail .追逐利润最大化似乎注定将会盛行。
n. 传动装置，[机] 变速器；传递；传送；播送 同义词:gear, driving device These are all examples of transmission principles .这些都是传播法则的例子。

n. 欲望；要求，心愿；性欲 vt. 想要；要求；希望得到… vi. 渴望 同义词:requirement, wants, do, need, wish, feel like, wanna, require, mean, exact, rare, aspire, long for, yearn for, die for I desired candy all the time I was dieting.当我节食时我很想吃糖果。
adj. 卓越的；极好的；杰出的 同义词:remarkable, wonderful, famous, prominent, brilliant Oh , Zeng , excellent . I could use some good news right now.哦，小曾，很好。我可以听你给我带来的好消息了。
n. 哲学家；哲人 同义词:wise man, rishi Shakespeare was a dreamer , and some say he was a philosopher too.莎士比亚是个梦想家，也有人说他是哲学家。
n. 差异；不同；争执 同义词:diversity, conflict, disparity, deviations Every country has something that differences it from another.每个国家自有与别国不同之处。

n. 星期四 Wednesday and Thursday of next week .下周的星期三和星期四。
n. 显微镜 Much greater magnification can be obtained with the electron microscope .用电子显微镜能获得大得多的放大倍数。
n. 立场；观点 同义词:viewpoint, perspective, outlook, eye, sentiment From a political standpoint , too, the moves were a success .从一个政治的立场来看，这次行动也是成功的。
adj. 亲密的；私人的；精通的；有性关系的 n. 知己；至交 vt. 暗示；通知；宣布 同义词:private, close, perfect, chamber, confidant, alter ego, bill, message He intimated to me his intention of leaving early.他向我暗示他要早些离开。

n. 含义；暗示；牵连，卷入 同义词:connotation, meaning, import, involvement, reminder But the other implication is not so easily proved .但是，相反的推断不是容易证明的。
vt. 使…混合；使…联合；使…团结 vi. 团结；联合；混合 同义词:intermix, league, band, combine, connect, rally Several firms were united to form one company.把几家商行合并成一个公司。
n. 生日，诞辰；诞生的日子 Today is your birthday , Nancy .南希，今天是你的生日。
adj. 遥远的；冷漠的；远隔的 同义词:remote, faraway A faint impression of a submerged castle shimmered in distant background .一座朦胧的水下城堡在深远的背景中微微闪光。
n. 矿物；（英）矿泉水；无机物；苏打水（常用复数表示） adj. 矿物的；矿质的 同义词:table-water, inorganics The experts at NIH say the wax can be softened by mineral oil , glycerin or eardrops .NIH的专家们说耳蜡可以通过矿物油、甘油或者滴耳剂进行软化。

n. 童年时期；幼年时代 I had no family , no memories , no childhood .我没有家人，没有记忆，没有童年。

adv. 然而，不过；虽然如此 conj. 然而，不过 同义词:though, natheless, whereas, however, while, but, yet The cop told them to clear out,nevertheless they seemed not to hear.警察让他们离开，可他们就好像没听见一样动也不动。
n. 自由，自主；直率 同义词:independence, liberty For now , growth is bringing wealth , respect and freedom of action .目前，经济增长正带来财富，尊重和行为自由。
adj. 形容词的；从属的 n. 形容词 同义词:dependent, under In " blue pencil ", the adjective " blue " qualify the noun " pencil .在“蓝铅笔”中形容词“蓝”修饰名词“铅笔”。
adj. 本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的 n. 本地人；土产；当地居民 同义词:crude, inherent, indigen, local product He told his family and friends he would study and paint Native Americans .他告诉家人和朋友自己将研究和绘画美洲土著人。
vt. 削弱；使跛；使残废 n. 跛子；残废 adj. 跛的；残废的 同义词:break, to weaken, disablement, lameness, disabled, spavined He was crippled in the war.他在战争中成了跛子。

n. 投资；投入；封锁 同义词:input, introjection At home also he listened to considerable talk of financial investment and adventure .他在家里也曾听到许多金融投资和金融投机的谈话。

n. 技师，技术员；技巧纯熟的人 同义词:lab-technician One technician proposes installing a hub .一个技术人员计画安装一个毂。
n. 牛肉；肌肉；食用牛；牢骚 vi. 抱怨，告发；发牢骚 vt. 养；加强 同义词:muscle, hotpot, repine, rail against, enhance, cement, muscle Stop beefing about the price increase.不要对涨价没完没了地发牢骚了。

n. 改正，修正 同义词:modification, reform, rectification, revision, amendment Correction of a bug on the frequency of the monitor linked with the choice of the resolution .修正了一个关于监视器刷新频率上选择图形分辨率的错误。
n. 一月 But January 's rise in the claimant count is a worrying portent .但是一月份申请人数的增加是一个令人担忧的预兆。
n. 阶段；舞台；戏剧；驿站 vt. 举行；上演；筹划 vi. 举行；适于上演；乘驿车旅行 同义词:drama, phase, age, grade, theater, celebrate, put on, come off, to hold A new hit drama will be stagged next week.一部新的具轰动效应的话剧将于下星期上演。
